text: Khandu bhai...how do you feel after getting the highest package of 2020 campus placement??..mtlb chap hi diye bhaiğŸ™Œ...itna paisa mil rha fir bhi rr...aur kitna chahiye...anyway, but you deserved it bhai...i know we became friends too late...but koi nhi...der aaye,durust aayeğŸ˜œ...our wing were a little apart, but jb bhi shashank se milne aata tha, mai tum se jarur milta tha...kafi time to tu shashank k room me hi pda rhta thağŸ¤£...but before meeting you, i heard ki you are a good person(again shashank told me), but when we started talking further and came to know you better, I found it correct...you are genuinely a very good person, which is rare...this is one of the reason ki even on hanging out not much with you, we share a great friendships. Aur bhai help ki kya hi baat kru...u remember that python ka paper...bhai wo mujhe kisine bheja tha jisko kisi aur ne bheja tha...inception ho gya bcğŸ˜‚...and still you solved it...kbhi bhi phone kro, koi jarurat hoâ€¦.always there...kha milte hai bhai aise friends...i feel really really lucky that you are my friend, and i hope ki it remains forever. And yes, we played sports together...baddi...volley..football...i truly enjoyed your supporting attack in footballğŸ˜…...aur bhai ek free advice de rha, abe itna na piya kr...piyakkad hai kya??ğŸ¤£...free ka daru hai mtlb kya, pura gatak jaogeğŸ˜‚...ab bhut pi liye free ka, now its your turn...US jane se phle bhai ek bar dary pilate janağŸ·..unlimitedğŸ˜…...badle me mai tumhe bakchod videos bhejte rhungağŸ¤£...chalo bhai...all the best for your great journey ahead...love u brotherğŸ’“ğŸ’“...take care!
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text:
â€œJha2â€...this is your name in my contact listğŸ˜‚...just to respect youğŸ˜œ...but you actually deserve it manâ€¦â€™chapuâ€™ is the most used lingo in iitk ig...people use it on almost everyday, chahe sala wo hag k hi kyo n aaya hoğŸ˜ƒ...but you are the real â€˜chapuâ€™ man...mtlb everywhereâ€¦.chahe wo acads ho, chess ho, swimming ho, ya frisbee ho, and yes a poke champion...everywhere man...and itna kuchh krte hue bhi maintaining such a good acads recordğŸ™...You are such a nice person yar...We didnâ€™t even talk during our 1st sem, if iâ€™m correct...again due to hagga partition yar...but i wish ki hmari dosti 1st year se hoti (fir to 1st yr bhi waste kr dete FIFA me ğŸ˜ƒ)...do u remember?The first thing that we talked about was FIFAğŸ˜†...came to your room...bhai FIFA dal do yar mere dabbe meğŸ˜ƒ...and waited in your room only, till i got it installed...us din se kya tha, nikal pda mai apne jindgi barbad krne k raho peğŸ˜‚...and that day, i didnâ€™t expect ki we will eventually become such a good friends...and yes i feel very very lucky that i got one of the nicest human being in my life...you are probably the first maharashtrian, who didnâ€™t have negative thoughts about biharis,,even at the beginningğŸ¤£).  If we talk about the time spent together, kya hi bolu bc, hmesha to kuchh n kuchh krte hi rhta tha tu..always busy...bahut bol diye to sale khel leta tha fifa...but kya hi kr skte tum, dept bhi to gandu hi tha tumharağŸ˜…...but still, we did bakchodi...bhar bhar k...played baddi together, and yes your favourite â€˜frisbeeâ€™...initially, i thought ki frisbee is not at interesting at all...but when played, i actually enjoyed it a lot (aur to aur, this sports suits me, less injury possibleğŸ™‚)...so thank you for making me explore one more sports...you might be good at many things, but bro you need more and more practice in fifa. Do you know why i used to call , particularly you to play fifa??to bring back the confidenceğŸ˜‚...aur wo Rishikesh trip kafi badhiya tha yar...kafi mje kiye hmne...probably the best trip that we could ever make...it was really awesome. 
And, how could i forget that internship prep bro...you really helped me a lot...mtlb that is the time when i started coding, facing a lot of difficulties, but i had not to worry much cause you were there...also, there were a lot of time you helped me for which i will always be grateful to you. So, thank you so much for being the part of my life, and making my college time memorable. And sorry for not coming to Goa, but whenever you make another trip plan, consider me in. aur maine chess khelna start kr diya hai...just for fun...so jb bhi milo, thode tricks btate rhna...All the best for your future...andha paise kmao, aur mera trip sponsor krte rhna...Good luck. Love you bhaiğŸ’–ğŸ’“ and take care!
author: Mukesh  Kumar

author: Mukesh  Kumar

text: Adesh Bhaii...kaisi chal rhi upsc ki taiyari??? I remember ki ek bar pratyush rai aur Aditya Bajpai apne wing me aaye the, during our first semester, and asked us to tell what we want to do/achieve in our life...aur uss time hi tune bola tha ki I want to go into Administrative Services...mtlb bhai itna phle se life me clarityğŸ™...and now i see the level of dedication and effort you are putting for it...respect manğŸ™Œ...you will definitely achieve it, and that too in 1st attempt only...hmari baatchit to sayad 2nd yr me start hui thi, when i used to come to your room to play fifa with kratikğŸ˜€, and eventually got to know ki tum kitne achhe insaan ho...and iâ€™m very fortunate to have a friend like you. Abe ek baat bta, we all know ki agar sbse jyada kisi club me time dena pdta hai to wo drams club hai...bc fir bhi acads me itna kaise chap dete the...sala nahla mare dete the tum toğŸ™ğŸ™...but, putting so much time and effort was clearly visible in your act man...aur bhai act k sath sath khud hi script bhi likhte the tum to...abe itna talent...respect broğŸ™ğŸ™Œ...aur bhai last year me to hmari dosti aur bhi badh gyi thi...especially during the last 2 months of our college...aur iss time jo tune mera help kiya, bcz i broke my foot... iâ€™m really really thankful to you...you really helped me a lot...aur baki kya hi likhu yar...baatchit to hoti hi rhegi hmari...aur milte hai rajendra nagar me...baki apna dhyan rkhna, aur bs lge rho upsc ki taiyari me...I wish ki you get the best possible rank, and i know you will be a very good IAS officer...you still inspire me, but in coming future, you are going to be an inspiration for a lot of people out there...so, all the best...take care and, be a proud IAS officerğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text:
Yo mishra ji!
â€œAap this...aap that...aap ye...aap woâ€ bhai itna â€˜aapâ€™ kaun use krta hai...itni ijjat dosto ko kaun deta hai, wo bhi hameshağŸ˜‚...but this much respect is what makes everyone love you...not only this, your innocence, humbleness, and the way you behave with others, is what makes you such a nice person...lekin bhai itne sadgun hote hue bhi aapne daru-sutta start kr diya...start to chhodo, ab to aap pro ho gye ho...mujhe to believe nhi hua tha...but achha hua aap start kr diye, warna ritesh bhi aise hi rh jatağŸ˜†...aur bhai, FIFA me harne me mja aata tha n?? Lga nhi tha mujhe ki aap achha khelte honge, but you play FIFA quite good..i really enjoyed it (defeating youğŸ˜œ)...aur aap football kya khelte hai bhai...deadly finisher!! Open goal missğŸ˜‚...aise miss kriyega to aapko log goalie hi bnayenge nğŸ˜…...thoda weight km kriye, aur practice bhi...warna hmesha goalie hi rh jaiyegağŸ˜„...baki bhai thanks for all your help...especially during off campus time...so, thank you so much...best of luck for your life ahead...aise hi chapte rhiye hr jagah...keep in touch...bye & take care!
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text:
Bakait bhaiâ€¦i wondered what bakait means, and i still donâ€™t know...so i searched it and this is what i got from urban dict. â€the person who speaks a lotâ€...really?? aisa to nhi haiğŸ˜‚...it should be like - â€œthe person who does â€˜randi ronaâ€™ a lotâ€ğŸ˜‚...seriously bro, why do you do so much rr??? Also How?? Mtlb jiske life me sbkuchh shi chal rha wo kr bhi kaise leta hai...i think i know the ans...itâ€™s an art and you are an artistğŸ˜œ.
First of all, I really appreciate your hard work bro...mtlb intni mehnat, and that too with consistency...respect manğŸ™ğŸ™...you are truly an inspiration for a lot of people including me...and i am really lucky to have a friend like you. Also, I am very thankful to you for all the help that i got from you...hmesha nhi kiye hoge, krni bhi nhi chahiye..o.w it would make me cripple...but jitni bhi kiye, thanks for thatâ€¦
Kafi bakchodiya bhi ki hmne...sath me...played baddi together, played volleyball too(sometimes only)....also played football...and going to gym, expecting to be consistent, but ended up wasting money thereğŸ˜„..these time that we spent together were great bro...aur bhai wo apne batti k labs kaise bhul skta hu...you always got the previous slot to me(laugh me)...which helped me a lot for the lab...bhai ye bhi tumse puchh k jana pdta tha ki whi krna kya hai...no trust on TAsğŸ˜‚. So thank you for all of this...and also for being in the best time of my life, and making it more memorable...and that Rishikesh trip bhai...you be thankful to god that nothing happened to you, even after such a rough driving at such a height...abe thoda driving practice aur kr loğŸ˜œ...so all the best bakait, for your future...mehnati ho hi...aur luck to hai hi hamesha tumhare sath...aur kya chahiye...paise kmate rho...ameer to ho hi...ab raees bno...enjoy your life, be safe and take care!
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text:
Yo roomie!
Probably the best roomie ever. And the 1st person in iitk who i interact with. I canâ€™t bring even a single memory of 1st  year without you. You have always been the source of inspiration for me. That amount of effort, dedication, focus...i have a huge respect for you brotherğŸ™ğŸ™...bhai jitna mehnat tu krta tha n 1st year me, and the amount of belief you had in yourself, i knew ki you are definitely going to upgrade your department. And I was glad that you finally did it, and roomie k sath sath, we became department mates, which made me happier. 
And you are such a nice person yar, i really liked the way you used to interact with and show respect to others. I really learnt a lot from you. I still remember, when the result of 1st sem came, kafi kharab pointer the mere...i was really really sad, and you were the 1st person who came to me, provided me emotional support, and motivated me. Although iitk has provided us with a student guide, but mere liye tu hi guide tha. You wonâ€™t believe it, but I have saved your number as â€œAli Sirâ€™â€™ in my phone. You were really a huge inspiration for me, so thank you so much for this. 
Apni dosti k bare me kya hi btau, we were more than that. We were so emotionally connected yar...mtlb bina bole tumhe pta chal jata tha ki iâ€™m not good. You were always the one jo hmesha puchhte rhta thaâ€¦â€aur sb thik n mukesh''...and I felt really good whenever you used to ask this.
Kafi serious baate ho gyiğŸ˜‚...but apart from this, you were way too hilarious dude. Itne sare memorable moments diye hai n tune, kya btau...bhai wo raat ko tumhari bakchod harkate, and me and saini saying, calm down ali, calm downğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚...especially that day, when i was watching some movies, you and saini were sleeping,  and suddenly your hand came directly over my face, saying bhai aag lgi hai, bhagoğŸ˜‚...it was way more hilarious than being scared! Aur bhai hmara footballer bhi to hai...messi fanğŸ™â¤ï¸...but bhai messi hai wo, uske jaisa bnne ka kosis mt kro...yad to hoga hi tumhare sath kya hua thağŸ˜†...abe normal ankle twist se itna kaun chillaata hai...bhai tune game rukwa diya thağŸ˜…...aur bhai wo fifa ka din?? Wo bhi kya din the yar...bhai mujhe fifa khelna bhi tune hi sikhaya tha...aur fir bad me maine tujhe hi harane lga thağŸ˜...trust me, nothing gives more happiness than defeating the one who taught youğŸ˜€! Aur to aur, maine football me tumhare wajah se hi khelna start kiya tha...you used to say, bhai kafi mja aata hai, khela kro...aur kuchh bacha hai sikhane k liye?? Now you know why I consider you my guru! Bs ek chij aur sikha do...how to be so charmingğŸ˜...yad hai wo, when we were discussing ki kaun si dept. me achhi bandi hai, and all..then you asked me baati dept. me koi acchhi nhi hai kya, and i said(making sad face), na yar...then you said abe search kro( ig you remember the name ğŸ˜›)...bhai shakal se to tu bhola lgta tha...HSS club me yhi krne jate the kya tumğŸ˜ƒ...bhai uska memoir to likh do at least ğŸ˜œ.
At last, I want to say that there is a huge contribution of yours in being the type of person I am...You made my college life a lot easier...so, thank you so much for this...Please let me know if i could do anything for you...aur ab to tum M.S. krne wale ho...i wish ki you get the best university of world...all the best for your future...baate waate krte rhna...baki apna aur apne family ka khyal rkho...love u a lotğŸ’–ğŸ’–...and take care! 
P.S. - Many people will come and go, but one person that I'll always remember is you.
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text: Same dept aur same hall k hote hue bhi, hmne jyada baatcheet to nhi kiya, but last 2 months was really awesome...bhai bhut bhut dhanyawad ki tune FIFA21 khelne ka mauka diya mujheâ€¦.i canâ€™t tell you man how happy i was playing original fifa game...uske phle to bhai bs fifa crack hi khela  tha...i really enjoyed playing and beating you in FIFA xD. Ab to cisco ja rhe tum...congo bro...ab bs andhe paise kmao, aur kbhi kbhi party bhi de diya krna xD. I wish you a good luck for your future. Bye & take care!
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text:
â€œArrrriiiiiiii, use nhi dena thaâ€...how can i forget it bhai...your signature fifa rr ğŸ˜‚. cmon yar, acads me rr acceptable hai, fifa me bhi?? Yes, itâ€™s true that we didnâ€™t start talking during whole 1st year...you know that hagga partition, and also you were too busy in magging...and i was happy ki all your hard work paid off and you changed your department. I came to know you after 1st year when i heard ki, there is a chapu guy in our guy jo dassa se just rh gya...and i donâ€™t know how, but we gradually became friends, and fifa did the rest. And eventually we became very good friends. 
Tumhari kya hi tareef kru bhai...such a gentleman, good at heart, focused, helpful and most importantly always ready to listen to you. I must have done some punya ki i got such good friends. I hope ki our friendship remains forever. We had so much fun at the campus yar...played badminton,volleyball, football together...and yes fifa too...bhai fifağŸ™...bhai pura 2 sal barbad kiya hai hmne...always playing fifa...and time mila to thoda padh liye...wrna...eat,play fifa,sleep,repeatğŸ˜„...but kafi mja aaya tha yar...ek baat bta, itna fifa khelne k bad bhi bhai throughball k alawa kya sikha tu...u are still shit at fifağŸ˜œ...aur tumhare football skill ki kya hi baat kru..ohhooo...bhai open goal miss krna koi tumse sikheğŸ™ğŸ™..but anyway, i always enjoyed playing with you...aur ye kaise bhul skta mai...chess coordi...har jagah chapna koi tumse sikhe...aur bhai 'rishikesh' trip yar...bhut mje aaye the bhai...aur bhi trip plan kro yar...and haa, iss bar tu sponsor krega mujhe!...anyway brother, i truly had a great time with you at campus.
Thankyou for being the most memorable part of my life. I truly respect you man. aur  haa, first salary se ek badhiya gaming laptop khridna...aur fifa bhi...and yes, i have started playing chess now, thode tricks bta dena...all the best...keep your hunger of success intact...love u ğŸ’–ğŸ’–...be safe and take care!
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text: Dinesh bhai...Iâ€™ll start from the end...bhai tumhara aur shashank ka last hugğŸ«‚...itâ€™s unforgetful...emotional kar diya tha yar sach me...bc tum dono ro rhe the...aur meri aankhe bilkul sukhi thi...you made us feel emotionally dumb yar...but trust me bhai, i also felt the same...bs aansu nhi aayeğŸ˜³...i know we got to know each other very late...but heard about you a lot from shashank...Iâ€™m jealous yar, why each of the friends of shashank are so nice...tum,ritesh,mishra,khandu...jiska bhi naam le lo...but the good thing is we became friends anyhow...whether it is playing football together or playing cards together...which i feel great being friend of yours...bs touch me rhna bhai...Japan ki laundiya milte hi bhul mt jana hmeğŸ˜†...bhai bs japan jane se phle ek bdhiya se party de dena...warna hmesh virgin rhne ka curse de dung(laugh emojji)...ab to bhai tune football dekhna bhi start kr diya hai...we would definitely get along for interesting discussions...anyway bhai, i wish you a good luck for your future...not for japanese girlsğŸ˜…...Keep in touch...love u bhaiğŸ’“ğŸ’“ & take care!
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text:
Hi Pandey..hope u have moved on by now. I didnâ€™t want to write anything about you after what you have doneğŸ˜ (those who know, know it), but tum dil k kafi achhe aadmi hoâ¤ï¸. Also, I know that it was your last possible chance, so I forgive you. I can write a whole page on this topic..you know that...but i will maintain the dignity of memoir and epsilon amount of  your ijjat. 
We didnâ€™t talk even once during our 1st year, cause you were maggu at that time...baat krne  k liye kha hi time tha tere pas...and at that time, mere ko ye bilkul ye nhi lga ki we will become such a good friend. From the time I know you, you were the most chillest person of our wing, and ofc Chapu. Do u remember, tumhare pas kafi stories hoti thi , and u needed someone to spill it out. And then you come to most vella guy of the wing, who had always time for others (ofc it was me). That was the time when we got along and the strength of our friendship increased, if u remember. I really enjoyed those stories man (just say thanks from my side to the main storyteller). do u remember, ek din mera laptop aur notebook sb le liye the..just bcz i was not ready to listen to your stories...agle subah quiz thi...b**k aise harkate mt kiya kro, nhi to koi suplex deke chala jayega.I know i hit u once, iâ€™m really sorry for this...but kya mja aaya tha yar...aisa lga iâ€™m in wwe ring, and iâ€™m giving you superman punch. Even after this, we are such a good friend. But i have to ask you a question. Why you always betray me??chahe wo fluid mechanics ki endsem ho ya placement session ho...why??? jaise bhi ho bhai...but tum dil k kafi achhe ho...and itâ€™s very difficult to find people with a good heart...mai khud ko kafi lucky manta hu ki i got friends like you...playing full night badminton and volleyball...wo bhi kya din the..i really miss those days yar...and yes we havenâ€™t gone to any trip together, but next time be ready...to sponsor my trip!ğŸ˜(JPMC k itne paise ka kya krega). So, thank you for making my life at campus more beautiful and memorable bhai. There is a quote â€œHope for the best, but be prepared for the worstâ€. â€˜Worstâ€™ to tumhare sath ho hi chuka hai, now its time for the best. So, All the best for your future ahead. Bhut paise kamao...Be Rich...Ambani is not that far!
P.S. - You deserve someone better!
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text:
Yo Kevlin broğŸ¤Ÿ!
Yar same department k hoke bhi itne dino baad pta chala ki we are from same city, and even from same coaching institute(parth ashram). But jb se pta chala, tbse we started to spend some more time together...sitting together in classes & quizzes...bhai kitne quizzes to bs tune akele smbhala thağŸ™...ab to bhai same city me hai, wo bhi bilkul pas me...koi chinta wali baat nhi...ab to sare paise patna k kfc or bbq me jane wale haiğŸ˜...so, all the best for your future ahead...bhut paise kmao...enjoy your life, and kbhi hme bhi party de diya krnağŸ˜...good luck & take care!
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text:
Hii Babyâ€¦
Literally the coolest guy I have ever met...bhai tere wo moves during the birthdays and ofc on the fresherâ€™s night...you killed it man. You are the reason that I am watching the most-watched and most thrilling sports of the world..first time fifa maine tere hi dabbe pe khela tha (if u remember). so, the credit of me playing fifa also goes to you. Along with these all, suddenly i got to know ki tune nahla mar diya...wo bhi bina magai k...i mean how can someone be so cool and chapu at the same time. Respect manğŸ™ğŸ™. Bhai kuchh time bad to...fifa was a stress buster for me...whenever i got stressed...mai tujhe hi dhundhta tha..kratik ko dekha kya?? ğŸ˜‚(to play fifa)...there came a time i used to beat everyone in fifa except one guy...yes, itâ€™s u...cmon man, how can u play so simple and elegant football...no wonder, u r a pep fanğŸ˜œ...yad hai wo eso203 class wali incident ğŸ˜†...kya epic reaction tha wo yar...mtlb you made the whole class laugh...this will always be the most memorable part, along with the â€œRishikeshâ€™ trip. Phle pta nhi chla hoga, but you must know by this trip ki how much i trust you. Thanks for the safe driving baby. Kash tu â€˜Nainitalâ€™ trip pe hota...you know, when i had an accident there, the first person i remember just after the accident was you...kash tu hota to mai bach jata. Anyway bro...we have long life ahead and many many trips to come.
Just listen one thing baby, sam is mine...najar bhi mt daliyo ispeğŸ˜¡...warna world war-iii is not that farğŸ˜‚... You,sameer and mugal will always be in my heart...just let me in, and change it from â€˜trio foreverâ€™ to â€˜chaukdi foreverâ€™â¤ï¸. Sorry for not coming to the Goa trip. Next trip pe pakka iâ€™m in. aur jb bhi milo, donâ€™t forget to teach me some of your cool moves. love u bhaiğŸ’“ğŸ’“, and good luck for your future. and don't forget the Qatar trip.
P.S. - I love MessiğŸ’–, aur jb bhi messi se milne jao, mujhe bhi sath le lena.
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text: Hello uncle & also my long time roomieâ¤ï¸...kaise hai??...how?? How could you accept this name uncle?? but anywhere, that's your quality, you just donâ€™t give a fuck ğŸ˜ about what others think and call you. I still remember, we had not got along that much, even then we became roomie...initially, I was scared, what if we get into some conflicts...but thankfully not. You were so cooperative uncle...so thanks for that...baki jbse we became roomie , bde bde logon ka ana jana lga rhta thağŸ˜œ...just because you used to  complete the assignments even before they startğŸ˜€...mtlb how uncle?? But, thatâ€™s impressive. aur wo mini militia ki lat bhai...do u remember, we both come into the same room, aur fir sab ko pel dete theğŸ˜‚...kafi maja aata tha uncle...and  tumhare wo sniper skills...gajab bhai...sbko to ye lgta tha ki tu hacks use kr rha haiğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£...aur bhai aajkal tumhe kya ho gya hai...itne sare books reading...kha se aaya ye motivation??...padho padho, aur meri mano to blogs likhna bhi start kr do...and hm bhi book reading start krne ka soche hai uncle..thoda interesting books recommend kr dena...anyway, i wish you all the best for your future...keep in touch...good luck , and take care!ğŸ’—ğŸ’—
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text:
RAJABABUâ€¦.You better keep this name...last name k liye struggle nhi krna pdega...itâ€™s â€˜RAJAâ€™ and â€œBABUâ€ ğŸ˜ and RAEES to tu hai hi...Bhai, we are from same city, same department, almost same cpi (i know u are on the other side of the attha ki boundaryline, but still), and most importantly, same enthu to defend our stateğŸ˜‚. Right from the beginning of college time, that one person who was always with me was you. I really feel very very lucky that you came in my life, and filled it with more and more joy and happiness.
You are the reason that I explored so much in these 4 years...chahe wo gym me paise barbad krne ho ya swimming me ğŸ˜‚...jokes apart, but you are the most kind-hearted and supportive person among all of my college friends. Bhai, kitne courses to tune smbhala hai...warna pta nhi kitne repeat krne pdte, pta nhi kitne quizzes miss hote. So thank you for all of this...and yes how can i forget that Control System paper...bhai itni daringğŸ™...dude, you showed me your answer sheet in front of the TAs...who does that!!! The most unforgettable memory will always be the â€˜Rishikeshâ€™ trip...we had so much fun there, yes Thank you for sponsoring meğŸ¤—...And who will forget our â€˜Nainital Tripâ€™...that accident bro(at around 6000 feet height)...still haunts me...I should have trusted your driving skills man...but all of them was fun. We enjoyed it. Also, during the last month of our college time, dare to message a random chapu girl on insta, and getting her on video calls within two f**king days, r u kidding me!! dude, i respect you 3000x now.
The last one and half month was not good for me. I got my foot fractured and I couldn't even walk. During these tough days, that amount of help and support bhai...I really owe you man (not money ğŸ¤ª)...Thank you so much for all your help. We didnâ€™t have our last photo together unfortunately, but I am coming to bangalore...macha denge bhai!
These four years were really amazing...IITK has given me a lot of things, but you are the most precious one. I really wish that our friendship remains forever. I just wish you good luck and achieve whatever you want to. Aur haa, foreign mt chale jana. IAS bano...and do something for our city, our state, and our country...They really need you. Best of luck for you journey ahead. 
Love you bhai...dil se ğŸ’“ğŸ’“.
P.S.-IAS bnke bhul mt jana!
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text: Yo bro...first of all congrats for being placed at Google, aur wo bhi off-campus. We have played badminton together sometime, and played FIFA a lot. I really enjoyed beating you xD...i still remember my solo goal against you, hope it doesnâ€™t haunt you xD...itna time kafi tha to know ki tum kitne achhe aadmi ho...keep it intact..wish you a great future ahead...take care!
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text:
Arre pyare kumkum...mauj kr rha n bandi k sathğŸ˜?
Mtlb kya bolu yar tumhare bare me...sach me kuchh pta nhi chal rha...mtlb bhai hmesha to sath rha hai hmne...diff. Wing k hote hue bhi...classes sath jana, lab bhi sath me, courses bhi same lena...aur sath me jindgi k problems share krna...jb bhi mai akela feel krta tha, if i needed someone to talk to...i knew that there is one person jo hmesha available hoga...and it was you...maine apne jindgi k sare problems tumhare room me discuss kiya hai, with you and shashank...i might not get the best advice, but i felt really good after sharing it with you and shashank...your room was kind of a therapy center for me...so, thank you for listening me patiently...english was one of the hurdle that you were facing at iitk, lekin bhai english sikhne k chakkar me to tune TBBT kitni bar revision kr liya hoga tuneğŸ˜‚...aur to aur bhai to apna hai stud, bndi wndi huh...abe tum to chupke chupke bndi bhi pta liye...ab kya hi bacha jundgi me...naukri hai, chhokdi hai...bhai ab tu settle ho jağŸ˜†...itni sari chije likh diya maine, but it would be unfair if i donâ€™t mention how good at heart you are. This is what makes you special...dil k kafi achhe aadmi ho bhai tum...consider this one of your major asset...try to preserve it...baki to banglore ja hi rhe ab...khao pio...gym join kro, muscles gain kro...bs aur kya...aane wali jindgi k liye good luck...paise kmao...aur machate rho...love youğŸ’“ , take care!
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text: Yo bro...never got along much...but heard about you from shashank and ritesh, ki tum kitne achhe aadmi ho...i hope we meet in future sometime, & wish you a good luck for your future! bye and take care!
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text:
Hi Lambiii...ab khush n...so many calls(bhai likh diyo memoir yar)...ofc i will write bro, i mean how can i forget to write to the person who made my college life  more awesome...chahe wo sath me volleyball khelna ho (saying mukku bhaiâ€¦.pichhe ka pura smbhal liyoğŸ˜‚), wo badminton tournament khelna ho ( jo tu kbhi jeeta nhiğŸ˜€), ya fir raat raat bhar cards khelne ho...aur bhai cards game ko leke itna senti kyo hote ho bhai...itâ€™s just a game..and one more thing, bhai tu game me cheating krna kb chhodega...anyway, it was all fun yar. Aur thanks bhai for all those movie recommendations...whenever i wonder for the movie to watch, suddenly you appear...mukku bhai kya kr rha...movie dekhne ka soch rha hu...recommend kr n, and thatâ€™s it...but ek baat bta, anime se tujhe itni affection kyo hai bhai...why? U better recommend me the best one to start...and yes, bhai tumhe itne tv-series kyo dekhne hai...wo bhi kafi lambi...bhai ruka ja,warna aankhe bahar nikal aayegi ğŸ˜‚...koi nhi, isse atleast hme ye to pta to chal jata tha kaun si movies ya tv-series nhi dekhni chahiyeğŸ˜œ.
aur haa bhai...it might sound cliche, but you are like Nariyal... upar se jitne kathor, andar se khi jyada soft and sweetâ¤ï¸. Aapn dono kitni bar jhagad chuke hai bhai...but after sometime, sbkuchh phle jaisa, infact better...I think our bonding gets stronger every time we fight...should we continue doing thisğŸ¤ª...anyway, you are really too sweet manâ¤ï¸...aur bhai tu jo itna sports khelta hai, 1st year cricket, 2nd year volleyball, and finally became captain of volleyball...bhai tu galat jagah aa gya, u should have pursued your career in some sports...itna kuchh krte hue bhai nahlağŸ™.
Aur finally, placement me bhi chap diye bhai...itâ€™s OYO baby...CheersğŸ·...bhai oyo me bs 2 chijo pe dhyan diyo...phla apne kam pe...aur dusra dosto k liye available rooms pe...aur bhai, piyush se kuchh sikh, time aur chutiya dono mt ktwa...and yes never quit your primary job of sending messages to random girlsğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. And yes, all the best for your future. Explore everything in this world (except g**ls ğŸ˜œ). Paise kmao...raees bno...ye ias waias pe dhyan mt do, itâ€™s all a trap...love uğŸ’“ğŸ’“, and take care!
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text:
Ritesh Bhai...kya hi bolu bhai tumhare bare meâ€¦.you are just simple and elegant(in soccer terminology ğŸ˜)...you are like Nâ€™golo kante, a genius from inside, but at the same time, most humble. Just donâ€™t lose this humbleness. 
Iâ€™m glad that we have been friends since the start of our campus life. We might not hanged out a lot...bcz you know...diff wings and all...but we spent a lot of time together playing football bhai. Jb bhi khelne ka mn ho, the one person that used to reach out was you. Everyone is like...ritesh chal rha kya??...to mai bhi chlta huğŸ˜‚...real life me bhi itne followersğŸ™Œ!! and i must say this, you play a really good football...mere case bhi same, ritesh aa rha?? to mai bhi aa rha...people learnt from you on the ground too...bs mishra ji ko thoda sikha denağŸ¤£. Aur bhai wo patna ki trip...how was it?? For me, it was really awesome...especially the last dayğŸ˜…...mtlb pandey ki kya mar rhe the tum yarğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚...I had a really great time with you since we met. Also, you are so helpful yar...always ready to help...Iâ€™ll never forget your help during my off-campus application time. I am really grateful to you for this, and also for making four years of my campus life awesome. Hope we meet soon...so, all the best for your future...replace Sundar PichaiğŸ˜œ...Keep in touch...be safe and take care!
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text: â€œNaik nhiiiiiâ€¦.khalnayak hu maiâ€ ...No! Definitely not!ğŸ˜‚. Actually, you are opposite of this...a sweet guy with positive thoughts, and have zero haters...u better give this intro wherever requiredğŸ˜€...what should  i say bro, mtlb you are the nicest and bestest among all of my friends...you know, we became very good friends in much less time..donâ€™t know how...maybe bcz we share the similar thoughts...mujhe to ye yad hi nhi ki hmlog kb bs normal dost the...i just feel ki jbse hm ek dusre ko jante hai, kafi achhe dost hai...hmne almost sare courses lene k phle ek dusre se discuss kiya hai...and also took the same courses most often...even during the exam prep, we used to discuss and help each other a lot...aur bhai kafi lab courses to bs tumhare share pass hua huğŸ¤£...aur bhai how could i forget the placement session...I got a lot of the required moral support needed at that time...we also discussed so many quests which actually helped in further tests...these all really helped me during that tensed situation...so thank you so much for this...aur bhai last sem ka online testğŸ˜€...thanks for sharing your whole answer sheetğŸ˜…...aur kya hi likhu yar...bhai likhna chahu to pages km pr jayenge...so, weâ€™ll talk rest on phone call. Aur mai khud ko lucky manta hu tum mere dost ho...so thank you for being the part of my life...so, all the best for your life...milte rhenge...love uğŸ’–ğŸ’– and take care!
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text:
How should i start?? Calling you a culer, my FIFA partner, or chapu, or the overconfident guy, or a kattar maharashtrianğŸ˜œ, or Baby?? Iâ€™ll start with the last one.
Hi BabyğŸ’“...i have called you the whole college time by this, i still call you by this, and will be calling you by this...hope u donâ€™t get offended ğŸ¤ª, like i used to get whenever you said something bad about BiharğŸ˜‚. I donâ€™t precisely remember how we started talking, probably during Antaragni when we all(wingies) went together. But, by 2nd sem, we were friends. During the 2nd sem, i donâ€™t think we talked much apart from the aceds discussion, but our bonding started to increase when we went to â€˜Rishikeshâ€™ trip. We got to know each other better during the trip, and ofc we had a blast there. I also got to know that under 200 rank wale log bhi can be a real superchill guyğŸ¤˜. Lekin bhai tujhe mere state se itna hate kyo hai bhai(laughing emoji), the people here are so good man. Pta nhi kitni bar nok jhok ho chuki hai hum dono k bich me, bihar k topic ko lekar. But do you know why our friendship continued even after so many nok jhok, bcz you are most sweetest guy. You are so good man. I know mai kafi bar offend bhi ho jata tha, but bhai tu thoda stats ki jankari rkha kr. Aur bhai tera confidence, bhai tere ghar me confidence k trees hai kya??? Itna kaise bhai...but this is what makes you unique...â€™the confidence of being an overconfidentâ€™. Donâ€™t get affected by someone else, just be you. You are much better than what others think of you.
But bhai, ye FIFA ne jo bonding badhayi hai n hmariğŸ™...all thanks to FIFA...do u remember, how we used to play FIFA whole night...lunch miss...dinner miss...then raat ko roll order kro...puri raat khelo...subah quiz hai, kuchh nhi padha...fir bhi m** c****ye quiz..letâ€™s play FIFA...it was crazy bro...you were so competitive broğŸ˜...and bhai tujhe harake jo mja aata tha n...kya btau â€¦.we played so many league matches yar...completing whole league matches in 2 daysâ€¦(yad hai?maine arsenal liya tha, you took man city, and goel took man utd--his affection towards LukakuğŸ˜‚)...we were insane bro...but bhai bhut mje aate the yarâ€¦those were the golden days yar, and i feel sad that those days are gone. Humlogon ne itna FIFA khela ki pta hi nhi chala ki when we became best friends from good friends.
 And, yes I consider myself very very lucky that I got a friend like you. You made my college life more amazing and exciting.I hope our friendship remains forever. I just donâ€™t want to lose you man. And Iâ€™m sorry, mai goa trip pe nhi aa paya..but next trip plan kr, and consider me â€˜inâ€™ by default.Wish you a very bright future ahead. Also, I wish ki Messi doesnâ€™t retire until you meet him..Andha paisa kmao...Meet your idol...and hme bhi milwao...I want to see how inhuman looks like, and will get some pictures with him.
Love u  bhaiğŸ’“
P.S.-Una vez una culer, siempre una culer!
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text:
Hello Anshu (pet name revealed)..
Bhai, I just canâ€™t imagine itâ€™s been 7 years of friendship..and I wish ki it remains foreverâ¤ï¸. It is very difficult for any friendship to go so long. We both are very thankful to god that everything happened in our favour. I came to know you during our JEE preparations at FIITJEE. Initially I thought...ya, seems like a nice guy...started talking...and eventually became good friends while helping each other in solving fiitjee booklets. U remember anshu? that fight between us...MTH publication k book ko leke...i refused to give it to you, and u stopped talking to me...was kidding manğŸ˜‚...and then we became very good friends. This made me realise ki with whoever i had a little nok jhok , they became very good friends of mine (kyo pandey aur piyush ğŸ˜‚). We got so lucky bhaiâ€¦.same batch at FIITJEE, both repeated for JEE, again got in the same institute and batch(Parth Ranker ROCKS(rock emoji)), and fortunately got in the same college and even the same hall bhaiğŸ’—...everything happened in favor of our friendship. And I feel very lucky that you are one of my friends, and trust me, you have a very special place in my lifeğŸ¤—. I mean it needs a lot of effort to maintain any type of relationship, and I respect you a lot for all your efforts to keep our friendship going. 
This whole memoir would be like green trees but with no fruits if I donâ€™t talk about our college life. You made these whole four years of college life really awesome by showing us your writing skill. Bhai mera SHAYAR..kasam se yar...kya likhte ho bhai..ekdum gaddar...I had only listend earlier ki â€œPYAR ME LOG SHAYAR BN JATE HAIâ€, but you made me believe it. Here is a two-liner that came in my mind spontaneously, hope u like it:
Ek tum aur tera adhoora pyar, i wish ki it happens bar bar;
You might not want it to happen again, but trust me, this will be the reason for your name and fame!
I just canâ€™t wait to see you on youtube and your book to be a bestseller in India...macha dena bhai! 
And yes, thank you for being there whenever I needed someone. Whenever I was in a confusion for choosing or doing something or not, you were the first person who I went to. And, ofc how can we both forget that traumatic period of my lifeğŸ˜¢...man i just canâ€™t tell how i would have been if u were not there. I am really really thankful to you bhai. And thanks to you for making me start all the nashe thingsğŸ˜œ...it really feels amazing. Kuchh nashe bache hai, but i know ki tu uski bhi aadat lgwa dega. But, how could I forget that Nainital trip man. Bhai, mai maut ko takk se choo k wapas aa gya tha...it was scary..but i really enjoyed it man. The funniest trip was our regular Patna trip. Sutta fukna at every Patna trip. Jb bhi tum patna aate the, ek lambi list hoti thi tumhare pas, of all the street-food and their locations.Jha bhi jao, â€˜paisa wasoolâ€™ ki responsibility tum lete the. Bhai, to ek din bhukha aata tha, paisa wasool krne k liye. and ghar jakar pta chlta tha ki you have gained 5 kgs of weight...i mean are you for real??? And itne khane wale bnde ko achanak se diet follow krna, i canâ€™t believe my eyes. Jo bhi ho, you are following it strictly, and yes huge respect for this. Aur bhai, wo 85 kg wali bet ko jyada serious mt le yar, gareeb aadmi ko jeene nhi doge kyağŸ˜‚. The most hilarious and memorable trip to Patna was of course Janâ€™21. First of all, you should thank me for making you lose your weights, and saving your auto ka kirayağŸ˜œ. We did so much kand bhai...you know that! 
Last but not the least, I wish you very very good luck for your great journey ahead. I hope you fulfill all your dreams, and most importantly follow your diet, cause the â€˜BETâ€™ is still ON.
Love you 3000xğŸ’“ğŸ’“
P.S.- tujhe kya, phatna hoga to phat jaunga;
	Apne baap ka khata hu, nikal warna yhi utha k patak dunga!
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text:
Shailabh bhai...kaise ho?
Glad to know that we are from the same state. Dept. to same tha hi, but knowing that we are from same state, our bonding increases suddenly, especially during the last year of college. Bhai kafi help kiya tune last sem me. Thanks for that. Bhai tumhare chapuness k charche to pure iitk me hai...Omjee sir used to admire you a lot...and finally Adobe...against all odds of very high cgpa requirement...congrats brotherğŸ¤˜...Adobe jake bhul mt jana bs...kbhi patna aao, aur party warty de do bhai, kya kroge itne paise kağŸ˜‚...so, wish you a good luck for your life ahead...keeping going & growing...take care!
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text:
Hello senator saabâ€¦
Thanks me to not starting with g******dğŸ˜†...I donâ€™t really remember how we talked first time (pakka wo aapka koi gyan session hogağŸ˜‚), but we were among our 12 brothers, we were meant to be friends. Mujhe sach me nhi pta tha ki we would become such good friends, and i am glad ki one more very good friend gets added in my life, and i really meant it. 
Of course you were an integral part of my life at campus, whenever i felt low or lgta tha ki yar kuchh achha nhi lg rha, pta nhi kya chal rha life me, there was always a gyani baba there for me. And thanks for always being there. One best thing about you ki you try to listen people (not like me ğŸ˜‚), and easily understand what others want to say. So, just keep it. We also played badminton together so much bhai...and ofc cards...bhai pagal hi ho gye the hmlog card k pichhe...bro dinner ho gya? Letâ€™s play cards...and played it till 2â€™o clock...bro sach bta rha hu...sleep-cycle bigad chuka tha mera...and who wants to miss yours and piyushâ€™s discussion over the real life issues of India...pta nhi chlta tha kb time nikal gya...and for me, listening to this was really worth it. Kafi kuchh sikhne ko milta tha...and i would be happy to see you as an IAS officer. Our country needs people with such a broad vision. Aur haa bhai, wo placement session...bhai ekdum chaap diye the bhai...i was surprised as well as happy ki u did it on day1...sare 9 pointer walo ki band bjate hueâ€¦cheers for thatğŸ¸.
So, thankyou for being such an inspiring person in my life, and i know there are a lot of people out there who will get inspired by you. I really wish ki u get selected in very first attempt. And best of luck for your great journey ahead. Do whatever you want to do...love u bhaiğŸ’“...take care!
P.S.-Be a proud IAS officer.
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text: Hii Shubham...How are you?? So called funny guy...mtlb yar sach me, tumhe lgta hai kya ki tum comedian bn skte ho?? If yes...to audians k phle mai tumhe jute marna chahta huğŸ¤£...but canâ€™t believe yar, itna lame joke marne ka confidence kha se aata hai?? Koi n bhai...give it a shot, and i would be happy if you prove me wrong...bhai tumhare bare me kya btau...ek nanha munna sa bachha mila tha mujhe parth aashram me...and was handed to take care of him...aur aaj dekho, kitna bda ho gye ho tum...sbko galat sabit krte hue, aakhikar apne pairo pe khada ho hi gya...Iâ€™m really really of you...aansu hi aa gye aankho me ekdum seğŸ¥²...ab bs apne baap ki ijjat krna sikho...baki agar koi dikkat ho to tum jante hi ho kiske pas aana hai...mere pas nhi...shashank k pasğŸ˜‚...bs apna dhyan rkho...laundiyo k chakkar me mt rho ab...nhi to agli bar bhala se retegi tumhe...aur kya hi bolu...Iâ€™m just too proud of you...bye..love youğŸ’–ğŸ’–... take care!
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text:
Hello DATA gawd!! 
One of the nicest and kindest human beings that I know. Pta nhi tumhe yad hoga ya nhi, but our first conversation was about mth101 quiz. yad hai, mth101 quiz me luckily mere full aa gye the, sayad wing me kisi ka nhi tha...aur tumne puchha tha-â€tumhara hi full aaya hai kyaâ€ğŸ˜‚. Aur tbse, being from the same department, we became very good friends. Maine almost sare acads related chije share ki hai tumse...chahe wo koi course leni ho, assignment krni ho, ya quizzes and exams ho...agar mai koi bhi assignment kr rha, ya nhi bhi kiya ho, my last hope was you...and you always helped and supported me, and iâ€™m grateful for this. Tumhare wo previous years papers ka research...by god...koi be test ho...after exam, you are like - ye ques to last year k endsem me tha, wo ques to last year k assign me tha...bhai itna research kaun krta haiğŸ˜‚ğŸ™...but i bet this research of yours helped a lot of us. Bhai tumhare pas literally sari chije ki data hoti thi...ye ques kaun sa paper ka hai, who has scored highest in any exam, kiski kitni cpi hai..bla bla bla...No wonder, people call you â€˜data godâ€™ğŸ™ğŸ˜‚. Aur ab to tum fpl me bhi data analysis krne lge hoğŸ˜€...aur bhai to hmara chapu hai hi...no doubt...hmesha mugal aur kratik k room me dikhta tha tu..mtlb always...bhai pdhta kb tha tu...fir bhi hrek exam me chapnaâ€¦i really appreciate how smartly you study...bhai thoda bta dena, upsc prep me help ho jayegağŸ˜œ...and the best thing about you is that during all these acads discussion, you never made me feel inferior to yourself, and instead, have always supported and guided me...apart from all these, hmne sath me kafi msti bhi ki hai...chahe wo L20 me mini militia ho ya mugal k room pr bakchodiyanğŸ˜‚...i really enjoyed your company...and that rishikesh trip man, we had so much fun there...bhai scooty sikh le...kyoki jaisa tera body shape hai, koi nhi baithayega pichhe seat peğŸ˜ƒ...and that Delhi trip was also one of the best time we have...so, in these four years of college life, you were one of the most important people...i know hmari baat jyada nhi hoti hai...but whenever we talk, it doesnâ€™t feel ki hmne kafi dino se baat nhi ki hai...to kya hi bolu mai ab...i just feel very lucky to have friend like you...and thank you for making my college life a little easier...just always be as humble as you are...baki apna FPL group to hai hi...i wish you all the best for your future...jahan jao, chapte rho, aur paise chhapte rho...love uğŸ’– and take care!
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text: Swapnil bro...we probably met in mugalâ€™s room, aur tb hi pta chal gya tha ki tum kitne achhe aadmi ho..glad to have a friend like you...tumhari mech group - tu,mugal,sameer,kratik k sath kafi mje aate the...jyada time to spend nhi kiya, but jitna bhi kiya, i enjoyed your company a lot...aur jb job lgi, to mai kafi panic tha ki mere wing wale koi bhi nhi ja rhe mere sath, then in the final list, i saw your name...kafi khusi hui yar ki atleast ek banda hai jo mera achha dost hai..baki to bhai gurgaon aate hai...machate hai...tb tk liye, take care! & all the best for your future!
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text: Kaise ho vijit bhai??....I can't believe man...itni jyada bonding in just 2 months...all thanks to shashank that i got such a good friend. I really had a great time spending time with you in the last two months of college, whether it be smoking sutta or doing bakchodis in shashankâ€™s room...bhai jitna mujhe shashank ne btaya tumhare bare me, aisa lga nhi tha ki tum itne bde suttebaj hoge...lekin koi nhi...i was glad bcz i got a new company to smokeğŸ˜‚...bhai ek baat bta, itna kaun hasta hai be...bina daru sutta k hi high rhte ho kyağŸ˜ƒ...anyway, i really enjoyed your company bhai...aur suna hai ki tum bhi diet follow krne lge? Bhai ye dieting witing k chakkar me na pado...khayo, piyo, khush rhoğŸ˜›...jokes apart bhai...workout krna start kr do...ab to shashank ka bhi weight tumse km ho gyağŸ˜†...and, i have heard that you recently joined observe.ai, Congrats bhai!...chapte rho hmesha...all the best for your future...keep in touch!
author: Mukesh  Kumar

text:
Vipin bhaiii...
Nothing would be a better start than one of the happiest moment of your life...GATE exam result...under AIR 50 rank...cmon yar, itna kaun chapta hai bhaiğŸ˜¯...and so humble, at the same timeğŸ™.
Such a nicest human being yar...i think everyone should have a friend like you...i donâ€™t really remember when we talked first time, but who cares if we are already such a good friend. Aur bhai you were probably the only one among our group to have bandiğŸ¤ª(i know yo still haveğŸ˜‚). Mtlb ekdum chapu yarğŸ™..thoda dost log ko bhi time de diya kro yarğŸ˜œ...tumhara room me to gyani baba hi the bhai(laugh), so lucky! I guess ki tune baba ko ignore kiya hogağŸ˜…...we got along so much yar...tu jyada to sports nhi khelta tha...but whenever you played badminton or volleyball, i truly enjoyed it. Not only this, you were always there whenever I was a bit confused about my life, and sometimes I used to share my problems with you, so thanks for listening and also for giving me the best possible advice. You will always be one of my mentors.  Aur bhai last 2 months of our college life, kya mja aaya yar...playing cards till morning...bhai itne dimag lga k kaun khelta hai cards...you are a CARD game champion bro(in real life too)...itne analysis!!my godğŸ™Œ...and it was also bad time for me as  i broke my leg, i couldnâ€™t even walk...during these bad days, bhai you were always there...mai jitna bhi sukriya ada kru, km haiğŸ™ğŸ™. There are a lot of memories that we shared but the Rishikesh trip will always be in my heart...the best trip, which definitely wouldnâ€™t have been if u were not there. I hope ki we do more such trips in future. So, thankyou for everything, and will always be there for you. Best of luck for your future and  have a very great time ahead...love you broğŸ’–ğŸ’–.
author: Mukesh  Kumar
